rules_text:
Hexproof
Whenever a permanent you don't control becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, create a token that's a copy of that permanent.
special_text:
First mate–Each nonland card in your starting deck targets or has an ability that targets. [i](If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)[/i]

Whenever a permanent you don't control becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, create a token that's a copy of that permanent.
